subject: CRITICAL BUG - Notes Disappearing
body: CRITICAL BUG REPORT. My notes are randomly disappearing from the app. This has happened three times this week. Most recent incident: Yesterday I created detailed meeting notes with photos attached. Today when I opened the app, the entire note was gone - completely vanished. Technical Details: Device: OnePlus 11, Android 14, App Version 3.0.1. Reproduction Steps: 1) Create new note 2) Add title and text content 3) Attach 2-3 images 4) Save note 5) Close app completely 6) Wait 1-2 hours 7) Reopen app 8) Note is missing. I've lost critical business information. Please fix this IMMEDIATELY or I'm switching to a competitor. This is data loss and completely unacceptable.

subject: Feature Request - Voice to Text
body: Hi Product Team, Love your app! One feature that would make it even better is voice-to-text support. During meetings, it's difficult to type everything out, and being able to speak notes would be a game changer. Is this something you're planning to add? Thanks for considering! Best, Rachel
